questions.question: Solve the system: 2x + y = 7 and x - y = 2
questions.explanation: Add equations: 3x = 9, so x = 3. Substitute: 2(3) + y = 7, so y = 1

questions.question: Factor: x² - 5x + 6
questions.explanation: Find two numbers that multiply to 6 and add to -5: -2 and -3. So x² - 5x + 6 = (x - 2)(x - 3)
